<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/passwordless/email-otp"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Request a 6-digit OTP code for passwordless login.
Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
